name: HoustonMethodistFlashBriefing
0:
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Discover a new healthy tip every day from Houston Methodist.

For more than 100 years, Houston Methodist has provided our patients the best - and safest - clinical care, advanced technology and patient experience. We are proud to be the No. 1 hospital in Texas and one of the top 20 hospitals in the nation.

Our health tips are provided for informational purposes only and are not designed to replace a physician’s medical assessment and judgment. Always consult with your physician first about anything related to your health. If you are experiencing a medical emergency, call 911 or go to the nearest emergency room.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
